nodes.bodyText: Nit, long line? Maybe split it into two strings concatenation?
This has been formatted with helix-style, so I don't think we need to do a string concatenation.
helix-style won't be able to limit such long string within 100 chars per line. We just need to do it manually. If we have checkstyle for 100 chars check, this won't pass.

If it's not something we could strictly enforce, then I don't see a strong reason for doing so. That is if we have a checkstyle check- we don't have this check.
If you want to enforce a lint/checkstyle check, then we could again do it project-wide.

Let's discuss that as part of the rest improvement plan. We need to discuss what would make the most sense.
This is done to keep it consistent with other DELETE endpoints.
